org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class DefineSoundTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.CharacterTag
        • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineSoundTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterTag, ITag

    public class DefineSoundTag
extends CharacterTag
    Represents a DefineSound tag in a SWF file.

    The DefineSound tag defines an event sound. It includes the audio coding format, sampling rate, size of each sample (8 or 16 bit), a stereo/mono flag, and an array of audio samples. Note that not all of these parameters will be honored depending on the audio coding format.
